oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plan of Fort-William-Henry and camp, at Lake George / Will: Eyre, engr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eyre, William, d. 1764.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lake George, Battle of, N.Y., 1755--Maps, Manuscript.; Manuscript maps.; Maps shelf.; Brun Guide.; Germain Maps.; Fort William Henry (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; George, Lake (N.Y. : Lake)--Maps, Manuscript.; New York (State)--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Finished topographical map showing fort and entrenched camp, with detailed description of the position.; Shows direction of attack of French and Indians at Battle of Lake George, September 8, 1755.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: William L. Clements Library Image Bank
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: William L. Clements Library; George Sackville Germain papers; Sackville, George Germain, Viscount, 1716-1785
